items.text: very full, tossed up on middle stump, patted back past the bowler
big turn that spun a mile, from outside off and spat up too, hitting him below the shoulder
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fuller ball, he goes back in his crease to turn it to deep square leg
flatter on the stumps, picked off his toes to deep midwicket for an easy single
flatter and shorter, he goes back in his crease to tuck it to deep square leg

good length and has the batsman guessing with the turn. Spinning away from the left-hander, a bit more than he anticipated but he gets the bat far out enough to block the ball and not let it take his edge
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: James B: "Correct. India gave up 51 made up of 14 leg byes, 16 no balls, and 21 wides. Zimbabwe had "only" 39. India lost by 3 runs so that was the difference." - I remember the three-run margin well
items.text: he starts with a pacy delivery but it's wide down the leg side

items.preText: Razib Hossain: "How much money did you pay to publish comments Mahneel ? My comments never published." - check your email for my account details. I accept payment in dollars
items.text: lifter, but going down leg again and he handles it well in the end, fending it down legside. But manages to get it past the diving Shai Hope behind the stumps
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: another bouncer, on off stump that time. He stays back in his crease and taps it down to square leg with bat horizontal and head high
good length, wide outside off. Sarkar goes for a booming drive and connects only with air
items.shortText: Thomas to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: upper cut for four short ball outside off, he arches back and upper cuts it to third man. The man was square and can't run around in time to prevent the boundary
items.shortText: Thomas to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: another short ball, this time he stays beside the line and rises up on his toes with the ball to cut it over point for six
items.shortText: Thomas to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: good length ball outside off, and he watches it go through to the keeper. And with that it's time for drinks
items.shortText: Thomas to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Bangladesh will enjoy the drinks break. Victory is in sight, and West Indies look bereft of ideas. They are paying the price for a sub-par batting show
items.text: tossed up on middle stump and turning away, he plays with the spin to tap it to square leg
strays down leg and another wide. West Indies didn't have a high total to begin with. And they've made it easier for Bangladesh with these free gifts

edged to slip Sarkar has thrown it away. Good ball that pitched on a length and was spinning away. The batsman was committed to looking for quick runs which is perhaps what drew him forward and got him driving. The ball spun enough to take the edge and settle comfortably in slip's hands

dismissal.text: Soumya Sarkar c R Powell b Chase 19 (13b 2x4 1x6) SR: 146.15

items.preText: Mahmudullah joins Mushfiqur in the middle
items.text: tossed up, too full, but he just blocks it to cover
very full once again, almost a full toss, patted back to the bowler
good length spinning back into him from outside off, cut off the back foot past point
good length, on off and spinning, turned to square leg
items.postText: And that's it from me, Hemant will take you through to what should be the end of the game
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Thanks Saurabh. Bangladesh need just 20 more to take 1-0 lead. Keemo Paul is back
items.text: starts with a yorker on the middle stump, Mahmudullah jams his bat at it
length outside off, steers it towards point

items.preText: Tashfiq: "You bowl that delivery to Soumya Sarker, ball turning away from him, he will edge it to the first slip, guranteed. He has a serious problem with feet movement and he's been getting himself out this way for quite a while now. It's a flaw in his batting that he hasn't corrected yet. "
items.text: short of length, but down the leg side, helped on its away towards fine leg
length, just outside off, Mushfiqur opens the face of the bat at the last moment to run it down towards third man
length outside off, pushed towards points
